column4: in pulseaudio, does locking channels for alsa mean the settings for alsa are locked?
locking just means the left and right channels are locked together (both move together)
how do I make alsa settings stay in place. alsa has a habit of changing them
here is a blog about "saving" alsa settings http://linux.dsplabs.com.au/alsamixer-and-alsactl-store-adjust-and-save-alsa-mixer-settings-p29/
